sn7.15:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena mānatthaddho nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasati.
sn7.15:4.3: So neva mātaraṃ abhivādeti, na pitaraṃ abhivādeti, na ācariyaṃ abhivādeti, na jeṭṭhabhātaraṃ abhivādeti.
sn7.15:4.4: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ deseti.
sn7.15:4.6: “ayaṃ kho samaṇo gotamo mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ deseti.
sn7.15:4.8: Sace maṃ samaṇo gotamo ālapissati, ahampi taṃ ālapissāmi.
sn7.15:4.9: No ce maṃ samaṇo gotamo ālapissati, ahampi nālapissāmī”ti.
sn7.15:4.10: Atha kho mānatthaddho brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.15:4.14: “nāyaṃ samaṇo gotamo kiñci jānātī”ti tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn7.15:4.15: Atha kho bhagavā mānatthaddhassa brāhmaṇassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mānatthaddhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn7.15:6.2: “cittaṃ me samaṇo gotamo jānātī”ti tattheva bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti:
sn7.15:6.4: Atha kho sā parisā abbhutavittajātā ahosi:
sn7.15:6.6: Ayañhi mānatthaddho brāhmaṇo neva mātaraṃ abhivādeti, na pitaraṃ abhivādeti, na ācariyaṃ abhivādeti, na jeṭṭhabhātaraṃ abhivādeti;
sn7.15:6.7: atha ca pana samaṇe gotame evarūpaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ karotī”ti.
sn7.15:6.8: Atha kho bhagavā mānatthaddhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.15:6.11: Atha kho mānatthaddho brāhmaṇo sake āsane nisīditvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn7.15:10.1: Evaṃ vutte, mānatthaddho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.15:10.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
